info.name: Summary Reports
info.description:
The Drug and Health Product Register brings together information on product licences, drug and health product inspections, buying and using products safely, and side effects, recalls and complaints.

Contact Support:
 Email: open-ouvert@tbs-sct.gc.ca

header.description: (Required) The identifier assigned to your account for accessing the API

request.description: Returns all summaries of basis of decisions.

header.description: (Required) The identifier assigned to your account for accessing the API

response.name: Returns a list of all summaries of basis of decisions, or if an ID is provided, the list of all summaries that correspond to the given link ID
